name: Carrot and Apple Juice
author: xprincessx
summary: This is an extremely healthy drink I have almost every morning and great on detoxes as you get all your needed nutrients. You just have to play around to find the perfect drink. I find if you add beetroot, it makes it a fantastic color and gives extra flavor. To get the full benefit of the flavor, swish the juice around in your mouth; this is where lots of nutrients are digested. Enjoy!
directions: Run carrots, apples, and celery through a juicer (alternating carrot, apple, and celery) according to manufacturer's instructions
Add ginger to juicer and process
